abilities.basics: *Passive:* Start with -2 votes on public polls
abilities.win: The %n wins if they are lynched. When that happens they kill a target.

abilities.basics: *Passive:* Start with -2 votes on public polls
abilities.win: The %n wins if they become Mayor. The next election is cancelled.
The %n wins if they become Reporter. All current messages in the Reporter channel at time of ascension are cleared.

abilities.basics:
*Immediate Night:* Protect a player
*Passive*: Start with +1 votes on all public polls
abilities.win: The %n wins if they become Guardian. All players that didnt vote for %n are protected for the next night.

abilities.basics: *Passive:* Start with 4 votes on public polls
abilities.win: The %n wins if they do not gain any elected roles. Elected roles gained while being lynched count.
The %n wins if the player above them in the list wins.
The %n wins if the player below them in the list wins.

abilities.basics: *Role:* Chef
abilities.details: At the start of the game; the %n may select one waiter for every eight players (rounded up).
abilities.win: The %n wins if they are alive at the end of the game, and at least one waiter remains.

abilities.basics: *Role:* Cupid
abilities.details: During the first night; the %n must choose a player to become their lover. If the %n does not choose in time; they will fall in love with a random player. The lover is added to the %n’s secret couple channel.
abilities.win: The %n has the same win condition as the Townsfolk team; however it is combined with the lovers win condition. The lover and the %n are excluded from the combined win condition.

abilities.basics: *Role:* Cupid with 2 lovers
abilities.details: During the first night; the %n must choose two players to become their lovers. If the %n does not choose in time; they will fall in love with random players. The lovers are added to the %n’s secret couple channel.
abilities.win: The %n has the same win condition as the Townsfolk team; however it is combined with the lovers win conditions. The lovers and the %n are excluded from the combined win condition.

abilities.basics: *Role:* Psychopath
abilities.details: At the start of the game; the %n makes a list with one fourth of the players; rounded up; on it.
abilities.win: If all players on the list are dead; and the %n is still alive; the %n wins.

abilities.basics: *Role:* Psychopath + Stalker
abilities.details: At the start of the game; the %n makes a list with one half of the players; rounded up; on it. Each night; the %n may assign a player two extra votes in the next day’s lynch poll.
abilities.win: If all players on the list are dead; and the %n is still alive; the %n wins.
The %n wins if at the end of the game an even amount of players remains; including the %n.
The %n wins if at the end of the game an odd amount of players remains; including the %n.

abilities.basics: *Passive:* Survive first two night deaths and first lynch
abilities.win: The %n wins if they are dead.
The %n wins if the two players above them in the list die.
The %n wins if the two players below them in the list die.

abilities.basics: *Immediate Night:* Protect up to 2 people from death for the night
abilities.win: The %n wins if the player above them in the list dies first, unless the %n killed them.

abilities.basics: *Immediate Night:* Protect up to 2 people from death for the night
abilities.win: The %n wins if the player below them in the list dies first, unless the %n killed them.

abilities.basics:
*On Attack:* Escape 15 times
*Passive:* Public vote counts as -1000
abilities.win: The %n wins if every alive player has visited them or voted for them.

abilities.basics:
*On Attack:* Survives
*Passive:* Immediately Attacks all visitors
abilities.win: The %n wins if they attack four times.

abilities.basics: *On Attack:* Attacker can never attack again
abilities.win: The %n wins if they die by an attack.

abilities.basics: *Immediate Passive* Become the role of the first person who dies.
abilities.details: Join all of the targets Secret channels when becoming their role.
abilities.win: The %n cannot win while their role is %n.

abilities.basics: *Immediate Night:* Set a players voting power to 0.
abilities.details: Fails if target currently has 0 or less votes.
abilities.win: The %n wins if all players voting value is 0 or lower.

abilities.basics: *Immediate Night:* Check one players role.
*On Attack:* Escape once
*On Attack:* Escape twice
*Immediate Night:* Kill a player once
*On Death:* Attacker also dies.
abilities.details: Does not work for lynch.

abilities.basics: *Immediate Day:* Disguise yourself.
*Immediate Day:* Disguise a player.
abilities.details: Can be used on yourself.

abilities.basics: *Immediate Night:* Unelect a player.
abilities.details: Can be used on yourself.

abilities.basics: *Immediate Night:* Elect player. (once)
abilities.details: Can be used on yourself, unless doing so would allow you to immediately win. Becomes the role that would be present on the next days election poll.

abilities.basics: *Immediate Night:* Revoke all solo effects from a player.
abilities.details: Can be used on yourself.

abilities.basics: *Immediate Night:* Protect one player from attacks.
abilities.details: Can be used on yourself. Can't target same person on consecutive nights.

abilities.basics: *Immediate Night:* Protect two players from attacks.
abilities.details: Can be used on yourself. Can't target the same people on consective nights.

abilities.basics: *Any time* Make the host send any message of your choosing in the story time channel. (twice)
abilities.details: The host can choose not to send your request if they deem it inappropriate.

abilities.basics: *Any Time:* Can make the host send a fake game related message to the personal channel of a player. (twice)
abilities.details: The host can choose not to send your request if they deem it inappropriate.

abilities.basics: **End Day:* Send out a fake Cerberus's offer
abilities.details: The Cerberus's offer doesn’t actually work and will silently fail.

abilities.basics: *Immediate Night:* Use the powers of a Corrupt wolf
*Passive:* Public vote counts as +2
abilities.details: If the %n becomes Mayor; their vote is counted as 3.

abilities.basics: *Passive:* Public vote counts as -1
abilities.details: If the %n becomes Mayor; their vote is counted as -2.

abilities.basics: *Passive:* Public vote counts as -2
abilities.details: If the %n becomes Mayor; their vote is counted as -3.

abilities.basics: *Passive:* Public vote counts as -3
abilities.details: If the %n becomes Mayor; their vote is counted as -4.

abilities.basics: *Passive:* Learns information as a Reporter would
*Passive:* Wolfpack Access
abilities.details: You pretend to be a werewolf, but it doesn't affect your win condition.

abilities.basics: *Passive* You learn the names of everyone who visits you.
*Passive* Players who visit you get powdered.
*Passive:* Learns information as a Reporter would
*On Attack:* Switch roles with attacker (once)
